Intro.content: Today we combine our previous ideas.
We provide a personal goal and mix in some conflict to supplement it.
It's time for the test subject to leave the island.
But first they will need materials to build a raft.
And some food supplies to survive the journey.
We will make this challenging by interposing some predators.
Their goal is to collect branches and coconuts.

Coconuts collected.content: Well done. They got all the coconuts that are needed.
As for the remaining branches, we can provide them.
Now place the rest of them.

Complete - Easy.content: Quick and easy for the test subject.

Complete - Hard.content: Well that was a rough time for our test subject.

Outro.content: We ensure the test subject has some personal goals to strive for.
Without goals there would be no meaning for them.
And purpose is only found outside of oneself.
Tomorrow we complete our experiment, with a final test...
